title: From altitude camp to taper, base miles to Basque départ: How riders train for the Tour de France
content:
Lifting the lid on how riders peak for three weeks, why they don't taper, why Pogačar is sacrificing racing for training, and more.

Read the full article at From altitude camp to taper, base miles to Basque départ: How riders train for the Tour de France on Velo.
